def construct_permutation(N, K):
    if K != N - 1:
        res = list(range(1, N + 1))
        (res[0], res[-1]) = (res[-1], res[0])
        return res
    res = []
    a = 0
    while a < K:
        res.append(a + 1)
        a += 1
    diff = N - a
    while a < N:
        if diff % 3 == 0 or diff % 3 == 2:
            if a + 2 >= N:
                res.append(a + 2)
                res.append(a + 1)
                a += 2
            else:
                res.append(a + 2)
                res.append(a + 3)
                res.append(a + 1)
                a += 3
        else:
            res.append(a + 2)
            res.append(a + 1)
            a += 2
            diff = 0
    return res if len(res) == N else -1
